tool_description: Evaluates customer transaction history and patterns to identify eligibility for special bonus point offers and milestone rewards.

check_period_days.description: Number of days to look back for spending patterns

error_messages: Customer not found: Unable to locate customer transaction history.
Invalid transaction amount: Amount must be positive.
Invalid date format: transaction_date must be in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid check period: check_period_days must be between 1 and 365.
History unavailable: Cannot access customer transaction history.
usage: Provide customer and transaction details to check for bonus point eligibility. The tool analyzes spending patterns and milestone achievements.

milestone_bonus.description: Bonus points for reaching spending milestones

merchant_loyalty_bonus.description: Bonus points for repeat visits to same merchant

eligible_promotions.description: Names of promotions customer qualified for
